resources.string: Welcome to the Si Gatto app. Here you will get information about one of the people who uses my photo as a profile picture, who is also my master, his name is Ryan, he also asked me to introduce himself to you. So, here we go...

Introducing my name is Muhammad Ryan Fikri Fakhrezi, you can call me Ryan. I come from Wonogiri and am currently studying computer science at Sebelas Maret University Surakarta. My favorite programming language is Java because I come from Java.
